mapper.select: SELECT board_no, /*게시판번호*/ title, /*제목*/ content, /*내용*/ writer, /*작성자 번호*/ COALESCE((SELECT member_nm FROM member where member_no = writer), '') as writer_nm, /*작성자명*/ COALESCE((SELECT file_nm FROM file where board_no = board_no), '') as file_nm, /*파일명*/ COALESCE(mod_dt, reg_dt) AS reg_dt /*생성일*/ FROM board WHERE del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY reg_dt DESC

SELECT board_no, /*게시판번호*/ title, /*제목*/ content, /*내용*/ writer, /*작성자 번호*/ COALESCE((SELECT member_nm FROM member where member_no = writer), '') as writer_nm, /*작성자명*/ COALESCE(mod_dt, reg_dt) AS reg_dt /*생성일*/ FROM board WHERE del_yn = 'N' AND board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( title, /*제목*/ content, /*내용*/ writer, /*작성자 번호*/ reg_dt /*생성일*/ ) values ( #{title}, /*제목*/ #{content}, /*내용*/ #{writer}, /*작성자 번호*/ NOW() /*생성일*/ )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, /*제목*/ content = #{content}, /*내용*/ mod_dt = now() /*수정일*/ WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} /*게시판번호*/
mapper.delete: UPDATE board SET del_yn = 'Y', /*삭제여부*/ mod_dt = now() /*수정일*/ WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} /*게시판번호*/
